content: beginner square cup coaster pattern by carlie junor craft creatively this pattern consists of single_crochet stitches and chains making it a beginner friendly pattern the gauge is super easy to follow allowing you to use any yarn and hook this pattern is in u s crochet terms feel free to message me with any questions regarding my pattern on ravelry craft creatively or email me at
